title: Request to purchase a Car
description: Request to purchase a Car of a certain type using the command. If Economy is enabled, the player must have sufficient funds for the requested Car. If purchase confirmation is enabled, the user will be presented with a summary of the Car they are about to purchase, with a prompt to confirm the request. If successful, the player will receive an Owned car of the type requested.

title: Request to upgrade the Car
description: Request to upgrade the player's current Car's speed using the command. If Economy is enabled, the player must have sufficient funds for the requested upgrade. If purchase confirmation is enabled, the user will be presented with a summary of the Upgrade they are about to purchase, with a prompt to confirm the request. If successful, the Car will receive an immediate speed upgrade of the amount.

title: Request to Refuel the Car
description: Request to refuel the player's current Car using the command. If Economy is enabled, the player must have sufficient funds for the refuel. If scale cost is enabled, the cost will be calculated to the highest quarter percent (i.e. 25%, 50%, 75%). If purchase confirmation is enabled, the user will be presented with a summary of the fuel they are about to purchase, with a prompt to confirm the request. If successful, the Car's fuel will be fully restored to the maximum amount.

title: Display remaining fuel
description: When driving the player is able to display the remaining fuel in the car, presented in a fuel gauge.

title: Spawn an unowned Car
description: Spawn the requested Car to the player's inventory, which will be unowned.

title: Display details of Car
description: Display a summary of the Car's details; for extra information provide the extra arguments.

title: Add a Material to a BlockType list
description: Add a Material to a list of the chosen BlockType. Speed and Launch block types require an extra argument to specify the strength of the effect.

title: Remove a Material from a BlockType list
description: Remove a Material from a list of the chosen BlockType.

title: Display the contents of a BlockType list
description: Display the contents of the chosen BlockType list.

title: Stash a Car to the Inventory
description: Stash away the Car the player is driving to their inventory as a Minecart.

title: Claim an unowned Car
description: The player may claim ownership of an unowned car, allowing them to lock the car to the user.

title: Give another Player a Car
description: The player can give another player a Car that they are holding in the form of a Minecart, all of the details will be transferred and setting the new owner to the target player.

title: Remove Ownership of Car
description: Remove Ownership of a Car, allows the Car to be claimed by another player.

title: Create a new Car Type
description: Start a Conversation to create a new Car Type. The player will be guided through questions to create the desired new Car Type.

title: Remove a Car Type
description: Remove a Car Type from the available types to choose from.

title: Display available Car Types
description: Display all the available Car Types to purchase to the player.

title: Display Economy Information
description: Display all the Economy / Vault information configured. Each of the Car Types and their associated costs will be displayed.

title: Display Car Type Store
description: Display the available Car Types to purchase in an inventory, simply clicking an entry will submit a request to purchase the car of the type. Hovering over each entry will display a summary of each Car Type details.

title: Reload the Carz configuration.
description: Reload each of the Carz configuration files; changes made to the config.yml and strings.yml will be immediately applied

title: Display Carz commands
description: Display all the available commands to the requesting player. The list will be built based on player permissions and configuration.
